modName: Sabers Armour from the Fate Series
summary: This is a standalone armour of Saber from the Fate series, with both her armour on and off.
descriptionHtml:
Details
=======
Both can be purchased and bought from Belethor in Whiterun, as well as upgraded and crafted.

The armoured version is listed under the \'Steel\' section and require steel ingots and leather strips to be crafted while the unarmoured version requires linen wrappings.

Upgrade as you would any other armour, with the ingredients being a steel ingot and a linen wrapping respectively.

For those who are too lazy to craft items by themselves/buy it from Belethor, below are the console codes.

Saber\'s Cuirass: xx0015a1
Saber\'s Boots: xx0015a2
Saber\'s Gauntlets: xx0015a3
Saber\'s Clothes: xx0015a4

Also, as soon as someone teaches me how to customise armour meshes to fit custom bodies, I will adapt this to the current custom bodies that I enjoy. Therefore, please, someone step up and be my teacher =)

===================
Recommended Mods
===================
skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3542 for purely saber\'s sword.

skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4994 for more from the Nasuverse.
author: Midnight Falcon
